summary: INSIDE DRIVER'S SIDE DOOR HANDLE BROKE 5/2006.  NO REPLACEMENT AVAILABLE UNTIL 8/31/06, AND ACCORDING TO THE DEALER NO OTHER WAY TO REPAIR.  MY CONCERN?  FIRST, I CANNOT OPEN THE DOOR ONCE I GET INSIDE AND SECOND, IF THERE SHOULD BE A FIRE, THERE IS NO WAY I WILL EVER GET OUT.  THIS VEHICLE, FOR THOSE REASONS, IS UNUSABLE FOR 3 MONTHS.  *JB
